resources.string:
SLIDE

Each paragraph
is a slide

This is a slide
.
with a blank line

Tap on the preview
to start the presentation.
You may also pick
a color scheme there.

Done!

You can also add UML!

Enable PlantUML in the menu.

@startuml
Bob->Alice : hello
@enduml

@startuml nw 50%
class Foo

class Bar
@enduml
.
#Hello
.
@startuml se 50%
class Baz
@enduml

Check out the PlantUML docs in the menu.

Don't forget to export
to PDF and share.
Note: a PlantUML server is used to create the diagram. The textual data is sent via internet to the configured URL. For confidential information, use a trusted URL with HTTPS.
The configured text below is added at the start of every UML diagram.
